rukus.text: 26|53|(avvaru avarkal cenru vitave atai arinta) hpir'avn, pala urkalukkum (makkalai alaikka) paraicarrupavarkalai anuppivaittu
26|56|niccayamaka nankal peruntokaiyinar; (attutan) mikka eccarikkai utaiyavarkal'' (enru kuri, pala urarkalaiyum onru tirattikkontu avarkalaip pintotarntu cenran)
26|57|(ivvaru) avarkalutaiya tottankaliliruntum turavukaliliruntum nam avarkalai veliyerri vittom
26|58|(innum, avarkalutaiya) pokkisankaliliruntum mikka nerttiyana vitukaliliruntum (avarkalai veliyerrinom)
26|59|Ivvaru (avarkalai veliyerriya pinnar) israyilin cantatikalai avarrukkuc contakkararkalakavum akkivittom
26|61|ivviru kuttattinarum oruvaraiyoruvar kanta polutu ‘‘niccayamaka nam akappattuk kontom'' enru musavutaiya makkal kurinarkal
26|62|atarku (musa) ‘‘avvaralla. Niccayamaka en iraivan ennutan irukkiran. (Nam tappikkum) valiyai niccayamaka avan enakku arivippan'' enrar

26|63|akave, nam musavai nokki ‘‘nir umatu tatiyinal intak katalai atippiraka'' ena vahyi arivittom. (Avar atikkave) atu (pala valikalakap) pilantuvittatu. Ovvoru pilavum perum malaikalaippol iruntatu
26|64|(pin cenra) marra makkalaiyum atai nerunkac ceytom
26|65|musavaiyum, avarutan irunta anaivaraiyum nam patukattuk kontom
26|66|pinnar (avarkalaip pintotarntu cenra) marra anaivaraiyum mulkatittu vittom
26|67|niccayamaka i(ccampavat)til oru perum patippinai iruntatu. Eninum, avarkalil perumpalanavarkal itai nampavillai
26|68|(napiye!) Niccayamaka umatu iraivantan (anaittaiyum) mikaittavan, maka karunaiyalan avan
